website_summaries.verdict: A higher-than-average incline and strict adherence to federal safety regulations make this crib wedge a sound choice for babies who need a bit of extra lift.
pros: Offers a generous 14-degree incline to help combat severe reflux
Conveniently folds in half for travel or storage
Waterproof cover simply wipes clean for effortless maintenance
Cover and foam inner have been rigorously tested to meet the highest possible safety standards
Standard crib mattress width of 27.25 inches
cons: The cover isn't designed to be laundered, so if you're looking for something that can be washed regularly, one of our other picks might be a better fit

He slept better with bassinet mattress angled slightly, but now needed for crib mattress. This product works exactly as advertised, and stays right in place. Slight elevation helps the congestion (and gives me a better view on the video baby monitor) while he sleeps. Have also used in our Graco pack-n-play -- fits perfectly (in the hammock upper level; haven't tried on bottom level but would assume the same) and doesn't move beneath the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: ACKeenan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Our son spits up quite a bit when he's laying down flat in his crib. This wedge fits well in his crib and does the job. This was not as elevated as I thought it would be, but he doesn't spit up when he's sleeping, so no complaints. Because he's elevated, he does end up sleeping sideways when we go in to get him.
customer_reviews.author: T Suzuki

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product if your son/daughter has reflux! Fast shipping and product does what is supposed to. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect Wedge
customer_reviews.text: I love this wedge and use it in my son's crib. It fits perfectly in his crib as well as his pack n play. The only tricky part is putting it together. It has two foam pieces that come out. It comes with one in and one you have to put in. I tried a few times and I could not get the second piece in perfectly, so it's a little off. my son doesn't seem to mind, but I wish I could have made it perfectly flat.
